descriptionHtml:
"Withe01 Poleaxe Animations" by Withe01
version.1.1

----------

Two-Handed Axe(& Hammer) Animations redone.

----------

<Changed contents>
1. idle 
2. attack(include walk & run)
3. power attack(forward & sprint only)
4. equip
5. block
6. move(walk , run , turn , sprint)
!!new!! 7. backward power attack

----------

<Installation>
:Copy data folder in to your game directory.

----------

<Changelogs>

7/4 ver 1.1 Update
Added 2hw_blockbashpower.hkx

7/3 ver 1.0 Upload

----------

<Source>

"Two Handed animations redone" by Plzaxbb
2hm_blockbashpower.hkx

2hw_attackpowerforwardsprint.hkx
